nodes.text: Juggernaut Pilots, also known as tank troopers, Transport Troopers, or as Imperial Juggernaut Drivers, were a type of Imperial combat driver that piloted Imperial Combat Assault Transports. They wore grey-green armor reminiscent of Imperial swamp troopers, with a helmet similar to those worn by Imperial combat assault tank pilots and AT-ACT drivers. Some pilots had red markings on their left upper arm to indicate rank, reminiscent of coastal defender stormtroopers. Juggernaut Pilots served within an Imperial remnant on Morak. Sometime after the Skirmish on Tython, two pilots had their armor stolen by Din Djarin and Migs Mayfeld, who commandeered Juggernaut Five for their infiltration and extraction of the rhydonium refinery facility. They utilized SE-14r light repeating blasters.
